content:
Yerushalem vazhi irushishyar-poyee-dumpoll
Kartthaavavarude maddhye ni-nnevam chodichu:
/tengane mrthanaay- ningade gurunaathhan?
/tpunaruththhaanam-cheythaanavanennaar
Yaathraantyatthilavarkkappam-vaazhtthi-thaanamshi-
Chekunneram vegamava-rkkavanaa-rennarivaayu
/thaaleluyyaa-haaleluyyaa.

Kandaalum-kallarayil ninnum-daivatthin suthanezhunnettu.
Krooshichor - yudanmaar lajaa-bhaaratthaale thala thaazhtthi
/tmatthumayakkam vittone-
/tppol kartthaavangezhunnettu
/tdaanam cheythaanaanandam
Vin man lokarkkennevam-sabhayaaghoshichidunnu.
